name: Walking Through a Poem
description:
Walking through Shakespeare's Sonnet 14 in a museum-like space. As you collect poem pieces you will change the music. If you pause between poem fragments you can hear the sounds from the poem. 

All sounds, audio and composing done by me (smiletin)

Built-in unity with the basic 3D shapes. 

This was me testing out how to use unity and Wwise to make a 3D world with the sounds I create.
